name: Ogilvy Social Lab sa
goal:
At Ogilvy & Social.Lab we take great pride in deploying communication solutions that are effective at getting our client’s message across in the most effective and efficient manner possible. Our company has deep knowledge of how to protect and enhance the global reputation of companies, brands, organisations and governments.
We provide strategic public relations counsel to a variety of clients across our core practices: consumer & brand marketing; corporate communications; healthcare; technology; crisis and issues management.
We understand that it is critical to merge traditional Public Relations/Affairs and Influence methods with the digital and social media universe. Only through a seamless combination of online and offline communications, along with the weight of influencers, can we deliver our clients’ ambition in the most effective way. We are one the few Brussels-based agencies with large in-house creative & design teams and social paid media capabilities.
interests: Communication, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology
